name: Mirco Giacobbe
content: Dr Mirco Giacobbe - School of Computer Science - University of Birmingham Dr Mirco Giacobbe PhD School of Computer ScienceLecturer in Computer Science Contact details Emailm.giacobbe@bham.ac.uk View my research portal AddressSchool of Computer ScienceUniversity of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT UK Mirco Giacobbe is a Lecturer in Computer Science in the Theory of Computation group. His research interests lie between formal methods and artificial intelligence. He designs methods for the safety assurance of algorithmic systems with application to software, cyber-physical systems, and deep learning systems. PhD in Computer Science, Institute of Science and Technology Austria, 2019 Computer-aided Verification Recent publications Chapter Abate, A, Giacobbe, M, Roy, D & Schnitzer, Y 2024, Model Checking and Strategy Synthesis with Abstractions and Certificates. in N Jansen, S Junges, BL Kaminski, C Matheja, T Noll, T Quatmann, M Stoelinga & M Volk (eds), Principles of Verification: Cycling the Probabilistic Landscape: Essays Dedicated to Joost-Pieter Katoen on the Occasion of His 60th Birthday, Part II.
